Body: The market of crypto-currencies is too volatile and virtual assets are not provided with anything, except people's faith. Therefore, we have balanced our portfolio with a big bias in the securities market. 90% (stocks and bonds) and only 10% for crypto-currencies. Author: Denis Danilov
Title: [ANN] FITX - FIRST INVESTMENT TOKEN 🌟🌟🌟 $20,000,000,000,000 market
Body: FIRST INVESTMENT TOKEN FITX is the stock and cryptocurrency markets coupling  WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | MEDIUM | YOUTUBE  ONE PAGER | WHITEPAPER | WHAT IS FITX?  Pre-ICO Sale: Date: Q4-2018. Hard cap: $500 000 USD. Token value: 1 FITX = 0.0001 ETH. Minimum amount of invest: 10 ETH. Number of tokens for sale: 10 000 000 FITX. The token can be purchased for: ETH, BTC, WAVES.  For the period between presale and the token sale, the European company Ekleft GmbH assumes responsibility for the planned use of the collected funds. Ekleft GmbH Brabanter Str. 18 -20 10713 Berlin, Deutschland Registernummer: HRB 136566 B  ICO Sale: Date: Q4-2018. Soft Cap: $5 000 000 USD. Hard cap: $10 000 000 USD. Token value: 1 FITX = 0.00015 ETH. The number of issued tokens on ICO: 3 000 000 000 FITX. Of which for sale: 2 690 000 000 FITX (90%). The token can be purchased for: ETH, BTC, WAVES. The token cannot be reissued. All unsold tokens will be destroyed once the ICO ends.  New Token emissions: unavailable Bonus system: yes Presale or Private Sale: yes Team Allocation: 10% Know Your Customer (KYC): yes Min/Max Personal Cap: 0.01 ETH (or equivalent) / no limit Whitelist: no   THE PROBLEM At the beginning of 2018, there are more than 2000 cryptocurrencies in the world. We understand that with each year it will be more and more difficult for an investor to select projects for investments. There are several reasons for this: A. Extreme volatility; A. The percentage of businesses that fail is too high; B. Dependence on an unstable market; B. Lack of hedges. C. Fraud.  THE IDEA To create a new investment vehicle on the cryptocurrency market that will: ▪ Protect the investor from capital loss; ▪ Be independent of the cryptocurrency market;  THE SOLUTION These challenging tasks have created the basis to start the investment fund and to issue a token – FITX. An approach that has not yet been used in investments has been chosen for the project implementation. By coupling the two markets - cryptocurrency and stock. Such strategy will enable us to hedge risks on the highly volatile cryptocurrency market and significantly increase the profitability on the securities market, which is much more stable and liquid. The new approach to investment will help us to prevent deadweight losses on both markets. At the same time, to get acceptable result that will enable the fund steadily increase capitalization and a token's market value.  TEAM & ADVISORS Denis Danilov Founder, CEO 10 years of experience in the IT industry. Investing in crypto currency since 2015. Works with the stock market for 4 years. Denis invested in such companies as Apple, Nvidia, Netflix, etc. Experience in creation and automation of the information systems. Extensive business skills in e-commerce.  Gaurav Khosla Investment Advisor, Partner from India Master of Science, International Business. 10-year experience in financial and business consulting. Expert knowledge in stock markets. Since 2015 he has been doing business in Russia, specializing in the Indian stock market.  Nikolay Ovcharenko Investment Advisor, Partner in Germany Master of Science in Applied Mathematics, CEO of the Ekleft International GmbH, (Berlin, Germany). Since 1992 Nikolay is engaged in business consulting for FMCG, consumer goods and IT companies. C-level management in international corporations.  Gabriel Gutierrez Investment Advisor, partner from Spain Serial Entrepreneur. CEO of Baikal Mining. Creator of a mining farm with a capacity of 15 megawatts. Investor in the crypto-currency market. Expert on mining of bitcoins. Blokchain enthusiast. Degree from High School of Economics.  FITX Token Exchange has been listed on DEX  All reports on the spending of presale-funds will be automatically recorded in the Waves blockchain. Reports on the fund's expenses with detailed explanations and the use of certain presale-funds will be published weekly on the official blog: https://medium.com/@fitx

Title: [ANN] FITX - FIRST INVESTMENT TOKEN 🌟🌟🌟 $20,000,000,000,000 market
Body: Yes, we have escrow agent. For the period between presale and the token sale, the European company Ekleft GmbH assumes responsibility for the planned use of the collected funds.  Ekleft GmbH Brabanter Str. 18 -20 10713 Berlin, Deutschland Registernummer: HRB 136566 B  The wallet with funds will be unlocked for spending funds with digital keys, which are held by European lawyers.
